name: Portfolio Revamp
description: I realized there are a lot of things to improve with the current design of this portfolio so I started doing a redesign while still keeping some aspects of this current one. I fell quite in love with neubrutalism at the time so I took it as an inspiration. The development is going to happen soon.

name: Student Violation Record App
techStack: Quasar, Vue, Sass, Node, Express, Sqlite
description: My college had an outdated system of collecting violations committed by the students. The program was created to address the issues(e.g., security, privacy, searching, transcription) that come with using a paper-based system.
